name: interiority
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being inside something or someone: A person's interiority cannot be communicated directly to other individuals. The film is not really concerned with action, but is more a study of interiority.
More examplesFewer examplesThe artist blurs the line between exteriority and interiority in these works.These are just the outward symbols of an interiority that remains hidden from us.The tragedy turns out to be a matter of interiority rather than something that is caused by external events.
